metadata.title: Visage AI - Maximize CVR & LTV with Explainable AI Skin Analysis
metadata.description: Visage AI is an explainable AI skin analysis solution that achieves +20% CVR and +10% LTV for e-commerce and retail. SDK/API integration in as little as 1 week. Understandable recommendations with region-specific XAI.

hero.title: Boost CVR & LTV with AI Skin Analysis
hero.lead: Explainable AI & precise region targeting for trustworthy, personalized recommendations

step1.title: Design (~1 day)
step1.description: We listen to your business requirements and design the optimal implementation plan.

step2.title: Implementation (3–5 days)
step2.description: Integrate SDK/API into your existing system and confirm operation in a test environment.

step3.title: Verification (7–14 days)
step3.description: Conduct final tests and performance measurements in a production environment, and make adjustments as needed.

caseStudies.title: Case Studies
caseStudies.cta: See a demo to solve the same challenge

study1.challenge: Unable to accurately grasp customer skin concerns
study1.solution: Achieved personalized proposals with AI skin analysis

study2.challenge: Difficulty in product recommendation due to lack of objective data
study2.solution: Implemented data-driven recommendations based on skin analysis

study3.solution: Promoted repurchase by tracking changes in skin condition

q1.question: How is the captured face photo data handled? Is privacy safe?
q1.answer: No PII is required, and data can be sent anonymously after on-device preprocessing. Data retention is a default of 30 days (variable), and region selection for Japan/US/EU is supported.

q2.question: How long does implementation take?
q2.answer: Implementation is possible in as little as 1 week. This may vary depending on your system environment and requirements, so please contact us for details.

q3.question: Can it be integrated into existing e-commerce sites or apps?
q3.answer: Yes, we provide SDK/API that can be flexibly integrated into existing systems. We support major platforms.

finalCta.title: Ready to accelerate your business with Visage AI?
finalCta.description: Numerous companies have achieved improved customer experience and increased sales by implementing Visage AI.

demo.title: Book a 20-min Product Demo
demo.lead: We’ll walk through your use case, integration steps, and KPIs in an online session.

HeroSection.title:
From Experience to Retention,
All with Explainable AI Skin Analysis.
HeroSection.subtitle: Boost CVR and LTV for e-commerce and retail with XAI and segmentation.

FeaturesSection.title: Examples of introduction effect indicators (simulation)
FeaturesSection.subtitle: Simulate the impact of introducing Visage AI on customer experience and business indicators.
FeaturesSection.item1_desc: Personalized experiences increase customer satisfaction and encourage revisits to stores and EC sites.
FeaturesSection.item2_desc: Increase customer recommendation intention and create positive word of mouth.
FeaturesSection.item3_desc: Convincing proposals improve the purchase decision rate.
FeaturesSection.footnote: *The figures shown are simulation values calculated based on our customer data and market research. The actual effect varies depending on the installation environment and operation method.

FaqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FaqSection.q1: How is the captured face photo data handled? Is privacy safe?
FaqSection.a1_p1: Yes, customer privacy is our top priority.
FaqSection.a1_p2: In the standard simple diagnosis, all face images are processed within the customer's smartphone. Analysis data is never sent to the cloud server.
FaqSection.a1_p3: Only when using more advanced analysis (PRO version function), after obtaining explicit consent from the customer, anonymized data that cannot identify individuals is analyzed in a secure cloud environment. For details on the data retention policy, please contact us directly.

ReportExamplesSection.title: See diagnostic reports in actual examples
ReportExamplesSection.subtitle: Experience how AI analyzes the condition of your skin and what insights it provides with an actual report.

PrivacySection.privacy_main_subtitle: Your data is strictly protected, and we strive for transparent operations.
PrivacySection.privacy1_desc: All communications and stored data are protected by industry-standard encryption technology.
PrivacySection.privacy2_desc: Access to your data is strictly managed to prevent unauthorized access.
PrivacySection.privacy3_desc: We clearly disclose our policies on data collection, use, and sharing.

StorySection.story_main_subtitle: Weaving the next-generation 'skin story' with AI and data.
StorySection.story_para1: Visage AI was born to provide scientifically-backed, personalized solutions to all those with skin concerns. We combine cutting-edge AI technology with dermatological knowledge to enable deep skin analysis that was previously impossible.
StorySection.story_para2: We aim to be a partner that understands each customer's 'skin story' and guides them to optimal care, not just a diagnostic tool. By visualizing skin conditions and tracking changes, we support customers in confidently pursuing beauty.

TechnologySection.tech_main_subtitle: Unraveling the truth of skin through the fusion of cutting-edge AI technology and dermatology.
TechnologySection.tech_desc1: AI clearly presents the basis of diagnostic results. It visualizes which parts were evaluated, why, and how, increasing trust and satisfaction for customers.
TechnologySection.tech_desc2: Accurately identifies each part of the face (eyes, mouth, cheeks, etc.) and analyzes skin conditions in detail for each part. Enables personalized care recommendations.
TechnologySection.ux_main_subtitle: Making skin diagnosis more accessible with an intuitive and seamless experience.
TechnologySection.ux_desc1: Fast diagnosis within 8 seconds, no waiting for customers. Provides a stress-free experience.
TechnologySection.ux_desc2: Anyone can easily diagnose their skin by simply taking a photo of their face with a smartphone. No special equipment is required.

ResultsSection.results_main_subtitle: Visage AI is improving customer experience and business results in various industries.
ResultsSection.result1_desc: Personalized diagnosis significantly improves customer engagement and satisfaction.
ResultsSection.result2_desc: Accurate product recommendations improve purchase rates on e-commerce sites.
ResultsSection.result3_desc: Continuous tracking of skin condition promotes repeat purchases by customers.
ResultsSection.results_conclusion: Visage AI strongly supports your business growth with data-driven skin diagnosis.

ScalabilitySection.scalability_main_subtitle: Seamlessly integrates into any business model with SDK and API.
ScalabilitySection.scalability1_desc: Easily embed into existing apps and websites with a few lines of code. Significantly reduces development costs and time.
ScalabilitySection.scalability2_desc: Flexible introduction is possible according to your security policy and infrastructure environment, such as cloud, on-premise, and hybrid.

scalability.title: Flexibility and Scalability of Introduction
scalability.lead: Seamlessly integrates into any business model with SDK and API.

CTASection.cta_bottom_main_subtitle: Please feel free to contact us with any questions about Visage AI, demo requests, or material requests.
CTASection.cta1_desc: Experience the functions of Visage AI firsthand. We will explain individually how we can contribute to your business.
CTASection.cta2_desc: You can download materials summarizing Visage AI's functions, case studies, and technical details for free.
CTASection.cta3_desc: Please feel free to contact us if you have any other questions or concerns.

Footer.footer_tagline: Weaving the next-generation 'skin story' with AI and data.

hero.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
hero.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your business needs. Scale up as you grow with no hidden fees.

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Perfect for small businesses and startups

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: For large organizations with specific requirements

q1.question: Can I change plans at any time?
q1.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately.

q2.question: What happens if I exceed my monthly limit?
q2.answer: We'll notify you when you're approaching your limit. You can upgrade your plan or purchase additional analyses.

q3.question: Is there a setup fee?
q3.answer: No setup fees for Starter and Pro plans. Enterprise plans may have custom setup requirements.

ingredients.title: Recommended Ingredients
ingredients.subtitle: Optimal ingredients for your skin type
ingredients.disclaimer: * These ingredients are general recommendations. Please perform a patch test and consult with a dermatologist before use.

items.name: Retinol 0.1%
items.desc: Clinically proven for fine lines; ramp slowly.

ingredientRecommendations.demoSubtitle: Display optimal ingredients based on skin type

oily.name: Salicylic Acid
oily.desc: Unclogs pores and regulates sebum production.

oily.name: Niacinamide
oily.desc: Controls oil production and tightens pores.

oily.name: Retinol
oily.desc: Promotes cell turnover and keeps pores clear.

oily.name: Glycolic Acid
oily.desc: Exfoliates dead skin cells and improves texture.

oily.name: Ceramides
oily.desc: Strengthens skin barrier and retains moisture.

dry.name: Ceramides
dry.desc: Repairs skin barrier and prevents moisture loss.

dry.name: Panthenol
dry.desc: Promotes skin repair and soothes inflammation.

combination.name: Niacinamide
combination.desc: Balances oil in T-zone and prevents cheek dryness.

combination.name: Hyaluronic Acid
combination.desc: Hydrates dry areas while maintaining balance.

combination.name: Salicylic Acid
combination.desc: Unclogs pores and keeps skin clean.

combination.name: Retinol
combination.desc: Promotes turnover and improves overall skin quality.

sensitive.name: Ceramides
sensitive.desc: Repairs skin barrier and protects from irritation.

normal.name: Retinol
normal.desc: Promotes cell turnover and maintains youthfulness.

normal.name: Niacinamide
normal.desc: Even skin tone and pore refinement.

normal.name: Peptides
normal.desc: Improves elasticity and prevents fine lines.
